title: Penalties for noncompliance
context: ยง576B-505 Penalties for noncompliance. An employer that wilfully fails to comply with an income withholding order issued in another state and received for enforcement shall be subject to the same penalties that may be imposed for noncompliance with an order issued by a tribunal of this State. [L 1997, c 295, pt of ยง1; am L 2015, c 77, pt of ยง1]
